name: Sulfur Planet
description:
A retro, Sci-Fi FPS on an unknown alien sulfur planet.
Made with Easy FPS Editor for the Reload Magazine Game Jam #1.

Pulled into the gravitational field of a sulfur planet, you plummet through its atmosphere. The spaceship is burning up so you eject in an escape pod. Your spaceship crashed some distance away from where you landed. Stranded on an unknown sulfur planet with its surface engulfed by oceans of sulfuric acid and toxic acid clouds, you find yourself questioning your flying skills. You land on a barren group of hills, knowing the only way to survive is to find your ship and use the remains of the wreckage to escape.

Move - WASD
Jump - Space
Shift - Crouch
E - Interact
Mouse 1 - Shoot
R - Reload
Weapon Loadout - Numbers


Skybox, acid textures, spaceship windows, pickup items (HP/Ammo), weapons and enemies By EAJB

Spaceship Design By Matt
https://ink-pot-graphics.com/
